entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of rain showers and then to 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers near midnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
